```{r}
source('Setup.R')
source('DataImport.R')
source('NutritionCleaning.R')
```

```{r}
CorrectDatDF <- data_cleanComFull
CorrectDatDF$Year <- as.factor(CorrectDatDF$Year)
print(ggplot(data = CorrectDatDF) + geom_density(aes(x = CorrectDatDF[,2], fill = Year, color = Year, after_stat(scaled)),alpha = 0.2, adjust = 3.5))
```
